text: Gen tte yaru ga i. `Keiten'notami yo. Rippo to fukuin to nushi kara anata gata ni kudasa reta,(subete no) keiji o junshu suru made wa, anata gata ga tatsu yoridokoro wa nai noda.' Tokoroga omo kara anata ni kudatta mono wa, kare-ra no oku no mono ni, gankona hanko to, fushinjin o zocho sa seta. Dakara anata wa fushinjin no min ni tsuite, kokoro o nayama shite wa naranai
